notes: Modern, well-maintained apartment on 12F of a 19-story building with clean hardwood floors, stylish light fixtures, and a spacious kitchen with black granite countertops, built-in oven, and ample white cabinetry. Notably, one room already has a children's bed with safety railings and built-in storage, making it immediately suitable as a nursery. Good natural light through large windows with balcony access in the living room. The balcony sliding door and high floor are potential baby safety concerns that would need child-proofing. Listed through Elegant Realty (expat housing agency), suggesting foreigner-friendly landlord.
